channel.title: Pandemic 2
channel.description: basically you try to infect the world with your own deadly disease, you can name it, buy symptoms and resistances etc its great Its strategy based aswell so you have to think before you buy something and keep its visability down so airways and ships don't get shut down or a vaccine made http://www.kongregate.com/games/Blips/pandemic-2
